Resolved Question Show me another » Fast food job interview? Do fast food restaurant require an interview if you wanted to work there? If so, what kind of questions do they typically ask? 5 years ago Report Abuse by think about that~ Member since: 18 September 2007 Total points: 2,824 (Level 4) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker Yes they will most likely require an interview. On the positive side of things fast food places will almost always hire ANYBODY.. so be your self... be positive about the job, and hard working and you will have yourself a job.
People tend to down play the fast food industry, but it is a very fast paced environment. There is also almost always ways to move up the work ladder and a lot of money can be made for a store General Manager.
GOOD LUCK Source(s): Former fast food manager 5 years ago Report Abuse
